body: I think I understand Oyster's thinking process and the motif in his stories. He gives the greatest feeling of despair one can experience to the character with whom you can most easily empathize and connect in the story, which makes you driving crazy (unless you're a freak). When the first time I saw a story of him, it made me sick and angry. However, I figured out his pattern although I'm not sure. He doesn't write a part in his stories that you can stop and explode, rather than a place where you can say "oh hey, let me blow it up here", it takes the story as a whole and aims to cast a shadow on the hearts of those who read it. After some time I think I understand this freak of nature artist and now that I've gotten used to his style, his stories don't sound that scary anymore. But the ones who start stroking their penises instead of freaking out when they first read it are real freaks xd.
This is why I believe that Oyster beats Shindol, to me is not even close. I mean I still find shindol's works hot, but this, this is just mesmerizing and kills my libido. the works of a genius

@ratedrmidnight it was about people who get lost in that slum and gets caught by the sex crazed inhabitants. Long story short you can't get out no matter what you try to do since the inhabitants somewhat doesn't need to eat and have unlimited stamina also libido
Fuuuck I was too into this that I didn't realize it's 3.30 I'd be late for work tomorrow I don't even know what my boss would say. Thanks for the fap anyway
Welcome to hell 😂
If i was her i could talk to police and arrest them plus i mostly like realistic sex story but that comic is a FANTASY
The most depressing part is knowing that scenarios like this actually exist in the darkest parts of the world. E.g. Junko Furuta RIP
This is insane but Metamorphosis is insanely insane a masterpiece.

Bring a real sword next time... and I am genuinely concerned an actual confused boner moment. This is literally the first time I've felt conflicted at heart I have a boner but I feel really uncomfortable. Really really uncomfortable. Damn. This is worse than metamorphosis. I got through that no problem.. but this, *this* is even worse.

And what's more? I've read it front to back!
